metadata.synopsis: One-linerSteel Watchers in the Streets minibooster.At Wall and near HAG SurvivorsFF Please rename to Fist Shargil ,overseeing scanning of civilians

0.speaker: Fist Shargil
0.text: Tyr take it! This tin toy may decide to go off duty, but we still have a job to do.

1.speaker: Fist Shargil
1.text: We're rooting out disloyal elements among the problem citizens, all right? Now move along.
